name: SID 0x3E Tester Present - Comprehensive Test Suite
description: Production-grade test suite for UDS Service ID 0x3E (TesterPresent) based on ISO 14229-1:2020 Section 9.3. Covers all positive/negative response conditions, session timeout behavior, service interactions, and error recovery scenarios.

requests.description: [SETUP] Reset to Default Session
TC-01: Normal Response in DEFAULT Session (3E 00) - Expect Positive Response (7E 00)
TC-02: Suppressed Response in DEFAULT Session (3E 80) - Expect No Response
[SETUP] Enter EXTENDED Session for TC-03/04
TC-03: Normal Response in EXTENDED Session (3E 00) - Expect Positive Response (7E 00)
TC-04: Suppressed Response in EXTENDED Session (3E 80) - Expect No Response
[SETUP] Enter PROGRAMMING Session for TC-05
TC-05: Normal Response in PROGRAMMING Session (3E 00) - Expect Positive Response (7E 00)
[SETUP] Reset to Default Session for NRC tests
TC-10: Invalid Sub-function 0x01 - Expect NRC 0x12 (Sub-function Not Supported)
TC-11: Invalid Sub-function 0x02 - Expect NRC 0x12 (Sub-function Not Supported)
TC-12: Invalid Sub-function 0x7F (Max without suppress bit) - Expect NRC 0x12
TC-13: Invalid Sub-function 0x40 (Mid-range) - Expect NRC 0x12
TC-14: Invalid Sub-function 0x81 (Suppress + invalid) - Expect NRC 0x12
TC-15: Invalid Sub-function 0xFF (Max value) - Expect NRC 0x12
TC-20: Missing Sub-function (Only SID byte) - Expect NRC 0x13 (Incorrect Message Length)
TC-21: Extra Byte (3E 00 FF - 3 bytes) - Expect NRC 0x13 (Incorrect Message Length)
TC-22: Extra Bytes (3E 00 AA BB - 4 bytes) - Expect NRC 0x13 (Incorrect Message Length)
[SETUP] TC-30: Enter EXTENDED Session - Session Timeout Prevention Test
TC-30.1: Tester Present at T+2s to reset session timer
TC-30.2: Tester Present at T+4s to reset session timer
TC-30.3: Tester Present at T+6s to reset session timer
TC-30.4: Tester Present at T+8s to reset session timer
TC-30.5: Verify Session Active (Read DID F186) - Expect Success (Session maintained for >8s with TP)
[SETUP] TC-50: Enter EXTENDED Session - Service Interaction Test
TC-50.1: Read VIN (0xF190)
TC-50.2: Tester Present between operations
TC-50.3: Read ECU Hardware Number (0xF191)
TC-50.4: Tester Present between operations
TC-50.5: Read ECU Software Number (0xF194) - All reads should succeed
[SETUP] TC-60: Enter EXTENDED Session - Error Recovery Test
TC-60.1: Send Invalid Sub-function (0x05) - Expect NRC 0x12
TC-60.2: Send Valid Tester Present (0x00) - Expect Positive Response (Recovery works)
TC-60.3: Verify Session Still Active (Read DID F186) - Session should be maintained
[SETUP] TC-61: Enter EXTENDED Session - Length Error Recovery Test
TC-61.1: Send Extra Bytes (3E 00 FF EE) - Expect NRC 0x13
TC-61.2: Send Valid Tester Present (3E 00) - Expect Positive Response (Recovery works)
TC-61.3: Verify Session Still Active (Read DID F186) - Session should be maintained
[FINAL] Reset to Default Session

metadata.author: UDS Simulator
metadata.description: ISO 14229-1:2020 Section 9.3 compliant production-grade test suite for SID 0x3E (TesterPresent). Based on comprehensive analysis of SID_3E_TESTER_PRESENT.md, SID_3E_PRACTICAL_IMPLEMENTATION.md, and SID_3E_SERVICE_INTERACTIONS.md.

notes: Test Suite v2.0.0: Comprehensive production-grade coverage for SID 0x3E. Categories: (1) Positive response tests in DEFAULT/EXTENDED/PROGRAMMING sessions. (2) Sub-function validation with boundary values 0x01, 0x02, 0x7F, 0x40, 0x81, 0xFF. (3) Message length validation for missing/extra bytes. (4) Session timeout prevention verification (>8s with periodic TP). (5) Service interaction patterns with Read DID. (6) Error recovery scenarios - verifying session survives invalid requests.

testCaseDetails.TC-01-TC-05: Basic positive response tests across all session types verifying 7E 00 response for 3E 00 and suppressed response for 3E 80
testCaseDetails.TC-10-TC-15: Sub-function validation covering all invalid cases: 0x01, 0x02, 0x7F, 0x40, 0x81, 0xFF - all should return NRC 0x12
testCaseDetails.TC-20-TC-22: Message length validation for missing sub-function and extra bytes - all should return NRC 0x13
testCaseDetails.TC-30: Session timeout prevention - verifies EXTENDED session remains active for >8 seconds with periodic Tester Present (>5s timeout)
testCaseDetails.TC-50: Service interaction pattern - verifies Tester Present works correctly interspersed with Read DID operations
testCaseDetails.TC-60: Error recovery from invalid sub-function - verifies session survives a rejected request
testCaseDetails.TC-61: Error recovery from invalid length - verifies session survives a rejected request
